lines: Welcome to THE WONDERFUL WORLD OF MAJOR PURCHASES! In this icon you will have the opportunity to purchase the material possessions you have always dreamed about! You can use either cash or our easy-to-arrange credit program!

While you are in this icon I will encourage you to spend, spend, spend to your heart's content. But, please note that spending beyond your means can (and in most cases WILL) be hazardous to your emotional and physical health!
Also, keep in mind these ancient words of consumer wisdom: "CAVEAT EMPTOR!" In this module, you can purchase several items. Would you like to make a purchase?
Thank you for visiting THE WONDERFUL WORLD OF MAJOR PURCHASES. Look for our circulars for the latest news on how you can save more than ever!
How fabulous! Your salesperson will be Bob Roberts. What would you like to purchase?
#TOYS AND GOODIES FOR THE WIFE AND KIDS
There are three watches that you can buy:
A practical choice. Intellectual sphere rises slightly because you have made a down-to-earth decision.
A somewhat-sensible choice. A more expensive watch will probably last longer than a cheap one. Social and Intellectual spheres rise slightly.
You are obviously a person who values status purchases. Your new watch impresses people, so Social sphere rises moderately.
#AN AVERAGE SOUND SYSTEM WITH THE STANDARD ROUND DIALS AND BUTTONS ($250)
#A HIGH TECH MODEL WITH LIGHTS, SWITCHES, LASER BEAMS AND SPEAKERS THAT A SMALL PERSON COULD EASILY LIVE IN ($899).
You have chosen a stereo that does the job without taking you to the cleaners. You have shown your resistance to peer and sales pressure by not going for the fancy package.

Your stereo arrives in twelve boxes and takes six days to put together. By the time you have it hooked up, production on the unit stops. Your model is obsolete. On the positive side, you now have something you have always wanted--the
ability to create minor earthquakes with the simple flick of a switch.
#A BASIC 35MM CAMERA SET UP W/INSTRUCTION BOOK ($125)
This camera takes good snap-shots and travels well. It will not win you any photography awards, but it is durable.
Looks like you want to take a crack at some serious photography.
Another toy with lights and buttons to play with. It takes good pictures, but must be handled very delicately.
You can purchase one of two set-ups:
#A GAME-STATION-BOX THAT PLAYS MOVIES AND GAMES ($275)
The basic model is plenty enjoyable.
Your friends will start coming over to your place to watch TV.
It's hard to type on these things; you'll mostly use it to watch TV and play games.
Your new laptop computer becomes a powerful useful tool. It helps you Vocationally and Intellectually.
The top of the line! Be sure to come back next year when your machine is obsolete.
You can buy sports equipment at $50 per purchase. Do you still want to buy some?
Physical and Social spheres increase slightly. (I will assume you use the equipment you buy at least a little before you throw it in the bottom of the closet.)
You can buy some new clothes at $100 per purchase. Do you still want to buy some?
Social sphere increases slightly. (I will assume that you have at least average taste).
There are five types of automobile you can buy:
It gets you where you want to go. Who cares what everyone else says?
A sensible choice, considering your budget at this time in your life.
A wise investment. There will be less money to pay on repairs.
What a showoff! The truth is, you'll probably never have the chance to live it up in a sports car more than now. If you can afford it, enjoy it!
If you keep this up, you'll probably be traveling in either a private jet or a hearse by the next phase of life!
You can buy some new books at $50 per purchase. Do you still want to buy some?
You can buy three kinds of boats:
Ah yes, the dashing sea captain off for a lovely romp on the ocean waves!
Ahoy Captain Moneybags! It won't be long before you own your own ocean to go along with it!
This choice does not apply to you!
Your generosity is appreciated by all.
Unfortunately, it seems as though you are trying to buy the affection of your family members, rather than earn it.
Would you like to pay for this with:
I'm sorry, but your current finances won't enable you to make this cash purchase.
I'm sorry, but because of your credit history you can not make a purchase on credit.

Your finance charge is twenty percent of the purchase price. This amount will be added to the purchase price. Now for the good news: You have the rest of the module to pay! Your credit purchases will not be deducted from your resources
until after you finish the module.
Please make sure you have enough money to cover your debts by then, or your credit rating will suffer, and you will not be able to get any more credit until the end of the game.
Thank you for CASHING IN on this ONCE-IN-A-LIFETIME VALUE! Come again soon!
